searchUrl:
<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

java.getString('td.3@a@text');
}

java.getString('td.4@a@text');
}

}

<js>

java.getElements('@css:.panel-heading,tbody tr');

java.getElements('class.book-img-text@li');

}

}

java.getString('class.panel-heading.0@a.0@href');

java.getString('td.1@a@href||a@href').replace("/d","");

else if(baseUrl.endsWith("twelvekings")){

}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")||baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")||baseUrl.includes("badge/")){
java.getString('td.0@a.0@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("reader/")){
java.getString('td.2@a@href').replace("/m","");
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
"https://www.qidiantu.com/info/"+String(java.getString('h2@a@href')).match(/\d+/)[0];
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: class.detail__header-detail__author@a@textNodes
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字].*?[】）\)]}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: class.detail__header-detail__title@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "🔒":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

ruleSearch.wordCount:
<js>
//用于自动生成发现规则
b=false;
if(b){
let api="/app/lib/listv2?packageId=ihuaben&page=\{\{page\}\}&pageSize=20&sortType=clickcount_days_7&tagId=0&tokenId=NTAyNDUwNTA6MTYyNjcyMzYyMzpjMGU3ODlhNzQ3OTZmYmIy&keyword=";
let words=['都市言情','古代言情','玄幻言情','校园言情','穿越言情','灵异言情','短篇','二次元','灵异','都市','玄幻奇幻','历史军事','武侠仙侠','游戏竞技','科幻末世','明星同人','动漫同人','游戏同人','影视同人','小说同人'];
var s=[];
words.map(o=>{
var i={"title":o,"url":api+o}
s.push(i);
})
java.log(JSON.stringify(s))
}
java.getString("$.wordcount")
</js>

header:
<js>

  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
      source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
      java.toast("请按照规则修改源变量，已重置源变量！")
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
    source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
  }
  let header = {
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; MI 8 Lite Build/QKQ1.190910.002) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/113.0.5672.62 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "ismobile": 0
  }
  if(variable.cookie){
    header.cookie = variable.cookie;
  }
  JSON.stringify(header)
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = `https://fanqienovel.com/reader/${c.itemId}?enter_from=page&force_mobile=0`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

if(baseUrl.match(/jjwxc/)){ var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DES解密结束 intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ vipc=/^DcAWGQtI44o=$/.test(content)?JSON.parse(src).message:decode(content) result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} }else{result="‎"} ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

ruleToc.chapterName:
$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

✱✱输入数字 变更发现列表：
1  男榜+女榜  (默认列表)
2  女榜+男榜
3  仅男榜
4  仅女榜

b=d.replace(/<.*?>/g,"").replace(/#.*?#/g,"");
c=baseUrl;
l=[];

if(/网页链接/.test(d) || /timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){
	if(/timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){
		l=[{text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c}]
	l.push({
		href:result.match(/"page_url": "([^"]+)",/)[1]+",{'webView':true}",
		text:result.match(/"content1": "([^"]+)",/)[1],
		info:result.match(/ "content2": "([^"]+)",/)[1]
		})
}

if(/网页链接/.test(d)){
	list = d.match(/<br \/>[^<]+<a  href=\\"[^"]+\\" data-hid/g);
	l.push({
		text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",
		href:c
		})
	for(i in list){
	l.push({
		text : list[i].match(/>([^<]+)<a/)[1],
		href:list[i].match(/href=\\"([^"]+)\\"/)[1]
		})
	  }
	}
	}else{
		l=[{text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c}]
		}
		l
</js>

  20230723 修改发现为动态获取-尐哖
	可以手动切换
	改变源URL地址(sourceURL)，网站就会切换
	下面套娃网站(m和www通用)

	齐齐读：https://m.qiqidu.net
  博看：https://m.bokank.com
  二品中文：https://m.2pzw.com
*/
try{
	c2=result.match(/c2="(.*?)"/)[1]
	u2=result.match(/src="(.*?)"/)[1]
	origin=baseUrl.match(/[^.]+[^/]+/)[0]
	str=java.ajax(origin+u2).match(/function.*\(\)\}/)[0]
	eval(str);temp=ajax(c2)
	java.ajax(origin+temp)
 if(baseUrl.match(/sscc/)){
 	u=java.get("url")}else{u=baseUrl}
 	//java.log(u)
	result=java.ajax(u)
}catch(err){result}

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
@js:
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
name=gs('$.book.name')
description=gs('$.book.description')
wordcount=ge('$.book.docs').length
author=ge('$.book.contributors').map(v=>v.name).join('，')
lastUpdate=java.timeFormat(new Date(gs('$.book.content_updated_at')).getTime())
cover='https://i.postimg.cc/sDjHTh9V/22-09-07-00-43-17.jpg'
result=[{
	  	  "name":`《${name}》`,
	  	  "author":author,

}]

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function encode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);
      return java.encodeURI(Base64.encodeToString(chipher.doFinal(String(word).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP));
    }
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      let bytes=Base64.decode(String(word).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function encode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);
      return java.encodeURI(Base64.encodeToString(chipher.doFinal(String(word).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP));
    }
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      let bytes=Base64.decode(String(word).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

}

ruleBookInfo.init:
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var og = (selector) => J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'); var book = { name: og('novel:book_name'), author: og('novel:author').replace(' ',''), kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'), latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' • ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+:\d+:\d+)/,''), cover: String(og('image')).replace(/@.*/,''), wordCount: J.select('.words').text(), intro: '
'+ J.select('.note').eq(0).html(), url: og('novel:read_url').replace('book','chapter'), }; book;
ruleBookInfo.name: name

<js>
//DES加密开始
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DES加密结束

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    pageSize:100,
    pageNum:parseInt(java.get('page'))
};

if(baseUrl.match(/categoryId/)){
data.categoryId=baseUrl.match(/categoryId=(\d+)/)[1];
url=getPostUrl(data,'qryCategoryResList')
}else{
data.content=String(java.get('key'));
url=getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')
}

java.ajax(url)

ruleToc.chapterName:
$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="bq"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}\}':u;
 u=tag=="lx"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}}':u
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))

":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ vipc=/^DcAWGQtI44o=$/.test(content)?JSON.parse(src).message:java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content) result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} }else{result="‎"} //评论开启 bbb = book.getVariable("custom") sss=source.getVariable() if(/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)){ java.log(sss) let commentNum =/评论/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]; commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList; commentb = ""; for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;
num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

//下面被注释的代码是已经有章节数的前面就不加序号了
bbb = book.getVariable("custom");
sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}else{num=num}

title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	title = title + " ❖ "+intro
	}else{
		title = title
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}
v=vip&&!type?' ◇':'';
l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l+v;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号
填写 [目录简介] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现
填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

2、源变量（所有书）
其余同书籍变量
填写[搜索+书名] —— 必须在第一行，搜索百合书籍，在发现里点击[百合搜索]

更改过后都要重新刷新

bookSourceComment:
在设置书籍变量处填
以下格式：
开始页-结束页
如
10-20
则评论从第10页开始，第20页结束
默认最多从第1页至第10页结束
（更改完书籍变量一定要刷新正文）

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/page=2/)){
result=""
}else{
allpage=result.match(/class='redtext'>([^<]+)</)[1];
list=[];

len=allpage>10?10:allpage;

start=1;end=len;
if(book.getVariable("custom")!=""){
start=book.getVariable("custom").match(/(\d+)-\d+/)[1];
end=book.getVariable("custom").match(/\d+-(\d+)/)[1];
}

for(i=start;i<=end;i++){
list.push(baseUrl+"&page="+i)
}
list
}
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>
